cmp: 包 (to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/to contract (to or for))
mng: bubble, foam, blister (i.e. skin bubble), to soak, to steep, to infuse, to dawdle, to shilly-shally, to hang about, to pick up (a girl), to get off with (a sexual partner), classifier for occurrences of an action, classifier for number of infusions
puffed, swollen, spongy, small lake (esp. in place names), classifier for urine or feces
